name: i've been late
description:
i've been late 

navigate through four different situations, each time dealing with social anxiety in a different way and growing each time.

a somewhat autobiographical first person vignette, with music by derek daley and made for hana lee (@bonaneh).

acknowledgments:

this game contains assets from No Longer Home: 29 by @humblegrove
